event RuleCreated(bytes32 indexed ruleId, (bytes32 ruleId, address token, uint8 tokenType, uint256 tokenId, uint256 balance, uint256 score, uint8 ruleType) rule)
function createRuleMultiplicative((address token, uint8 tokenType, uint256 tokenId, uint256 scorePerOwnedToken) rule) returns (bytes32 ruleId)
function createRuleThreshold((address token, uint8 tokenType, uint256 tokenId, uint256 balance, uint256 score) rule) returns (bytes32 ruleId)
function getAllRules() view returns ((bytes32 ruleId, address token, uint8 tokenType, uint256 tokenId, uint256 balance, uint256 score, uint8 ruleType)[] rules)
